title: Capstone reviews
content: Is capstone review schedule decided according to the team numbers or random ? And how many teams have reviews per day if it's according to team nos as I will be  out of station in 3 of the 8 scheduled dates which they have given

comments.body:
It is usually random, but your guide will have some idea regarding what the dates might be.  
You can generally request for a reschedule.
I talked to my guide for a reschedule. Is it enough or I would have to talk to someone else too
